projects.title: Petrochemical Refinery Expansion - Saudi Arabia
projects.shortDescription: Supply of 500+ high-pressure valves for refinery expansion project
projects.description: Comprehensive valve supply package for a major petrochemical refinery expansion in Al Jubail, Saudi Arabia. Project included gate valves, globe valves, check valves, and safety relief valves in various materials and pressure classes.
scope: Gate Valves: 200 units (2" to 24", Class 150 to 900)
Globe Valves: 150 units (1" to 12", Class 300 to 600)
Check Valves: 100 units (2" to 20", Class 150 to 600)
Safety Relief Valves: 50 units (1" to 6", ASME certified)
solutions: Dedicated production line for the project

testimonial.quote: Supreme Valves delivered exceptional quality within the tight timeline. Their technical support and documentation were outstanding.
testimonial.author: Project Manager

projects.title: Desalination Plant - UAE
projects.shortDescription: Butterfly valves and check valves for 50 MGD desalination plant
projects.description: Supply of large diameter butterfly valves and check valves for a new 50 MGD desalination plant in Dubai. All valves designed for seawater service with enhanced corrosion resistance.
scope: Butterfly Valves: 80 units (DN300 to DN1200, PN16)
Check Valves: 60 units (DN150 to DN800, PN16)
Gate Valves: 40 units (DN100 to DN600, PN16)
solutions: NAB and Super Duplex materials for corrosion resistance
Factory acceptance testing witnessed by client
Hydrostatic testing as per AWWA standards

testimonial.quote: The quality of valves exceeded our expectations. Supreme Valves' expertise in seawater applications was evident.
testimonial.author: Chief Engineer
